author: jih2nn
content: Here is another article on implementing FOCIL in the CL. It walks through major changes through the lens of the IL lifecycle and demonstrates how it can be rebased on top of ePBS. Please have a look when you have some time: https://hackmd.io/@jihoonsong/rJX-fxADxl

author: mwjeth
content: <@845691100072509460> <@755590043632140352> would you both be interested in doing a community call with ethstaker to discuss and help educate how ePBS and FOCIL relate to each other and impact solo stakers? if so, let me know and who'd be good to include.

author: .paulharris
content: Are we planning on updating node requirements to include what a PeerDAS supernode is expected to be?

author: .paulharris
content: I commented on EIP-7870, might be the best place to cover it...

author: ralexstokes
content: 7870 guidelines are essentially for minimum node requirements for a given role

author: ralexstokes
content: doesnt feel like the right place to document peerdas supernode requirements... do client docs provide info for nodes that subscribe to all attestation subnets?
